alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 18 at 12:57PM AKST until January 19 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...East winds 40 to 55 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected this evening. * WHERE...Downtown Juneau and Douglas. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects and may damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lulls in the winds are possible, but higher winds aloft will make their way down to the surface once again this evening. It is possible that the high winds may last past midnight.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
